Sokari Ekine bụ onye na-akwado Naijiria,  blọgụ   na onye edemede
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dika onye nta akụkọ na Pambazuka News ma dekwara maka Feminist Africa na New Internationalist
Ekine debere blọgụ n'etiti 2004 na 2014 nke o kpuchiri ọtụtụ isiokwu gụnyere ikike LGBTI, ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi
Odela ma ọ bụ dezie akwụkwọ anọ, ma kuziere ụmụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Haiti

Ekine edezila akwụkwọ Blood and Oil: Testimonies of Violence from Women of the Niger Delta (2001),  SMS Uprising: Mobile Phone Activism in Africa (2010),  African Awakenings with Firoze Manji (2011), na Queer African Reader na Hakima Abbas (2013).
A mụrụ Ekine na Nigeria site na nna Nigeria na nne Britain
O tolitere na Naijiria mana ọ kwagara England ịga mahadum
O nwere nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na teknụzụ ọhụrụ yana nzere Master of Arts na ikike na agụmakwụkwọ sitere na Institute of Education na Mahadum London
Ekine biri na United States ọtụtụ afọ tupu ọ laghachi UK, bụ ebe ọ chọtara ọrụ dịka onye nkụzi i agụmakwụkwọ n'ihu
Ọrụ izizi ya n'ịntanetị bụ n'afọ 1995 mgbe o hibere ndepụta email Black Sisters Network
A gwọchara Ekine maka ọrịa kansa na 2000, ihe kpatara ya na onye ibe ya kwaga Spain na 2004
Ekine dere kolụm kwa izu maka akụkọ Pambazuka afọ itoolu wee jee ozi dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ịntanetị ha na 2007
Ọ malitere ide blọgụ, Black Looks, na 2004, nke ọ gara n'ihu ruo afọ iri
Isiokwu ndị a na-edekarị bụ ikike LGBTI n'Africa, njirimara nwoke na nwanyị, ịlụ agha, ikike mmadụ, nka, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na Niger Delta, Haiti, ime ihe
na ikike ala
Ọ malitere Black Looks 2 na 2014, blọgụ ọhụrụ lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ foto ya.
Ekine bụ onye na-akwado ikpe ziri ezi na-elekọta mmadụ,  na-etinye aka na mkpọsa ihe karịrị afọ 20
Ekine edekwala akwụkwọ maka Feminist Africa na New Internationalist
Odela maka mgba ụmụnwaanyị na-alụ megide ndị agha steeti na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na ndị agha mebikwara na mpaghara Niger Delta mebiri emebi
Ekine gara Haiti dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ntanetị nke Pambazuka News na 2007  iji zute ndị na-ahazi ụmụ nwanyị maka Fanmi Lavalas
N'afọ 2003, e nyere ya mmekorita International Reporting Project site na Mahadum Johns Hopkins ma nye ya ọrụ ide banyere nlekọta ahụike na mba ahụ
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Port-au-Prince na- akụzi Bekee na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ọgbakọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị Growing Haiti
Ekine bụ onye nnọchi anya mba ụwa maka ụmụ nwanyị Niger Delta maka ikpe ziri ezi
Na 2016, Ekine malitere ịrụ ọrụ na akụkọ foto nke isiokwu ya bụ Ọchịchọ Mmụọ: Nguzogide, Echiche na Ncheta Dị Nsọ na Haitian Vodoun
Site n'ihe e depụtara na Mwelite SMS: Ọrụ ekwentị mkpanaaka na Africa :
"Ka mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze na-ewere ọnọdụ nkà na ụzụ kwesịrị ịdị mma ma gbanye mgbọrọgwụ na ihe ọmụma mpaghara."
